Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
Responsible for driving adoption of internal SW products across etch and deposition product group.
Work with application team and process engineers in the planning, data collection, modeling, data analysis, and reporting of results to process teams and other stakeholders
Works with process engineers and senior engineers cross functionally to understand roadmaps, process flow, inflection points, requirements, and business issues/ challenges.
Works with product managers and developers to make sure required capabilities are available for applications and provide requirements and user story
Contributes to product development and release activities.
Acts as single point of contact accountable for applications.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
As a Software Engineer you will seek important solutions related to Big Data platforms, API development and Data Visualization.
You will have an opportunity to learn Software Engineering methodologies by being part of an Agile team while being able to provide inputs and own projects from start to finish.
You will partner with a team of Engineers and have an opportunity to work with Big Data File systems, DB and Messaging frameworks like HDFS, Hbase, NiFi, Kafka etc..
You will collaborate with Product Managers, Product Owners and Technical Owners to translate business requirements and build robust and scalable products
This role requires partnering continuously with many stakeholders and global teams daily to stay focused on common goals. This includes coordinating with internal and external teams (onsite/offshore) as necessary.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
We are searching for a talented software engineer with a strong background in Solid Mechanics and FEM to join our development team. Our 3D modeling engine simulates the fabrication of complex nanoscale semiconductor devices using a wide variety of structural representations and algorithms. You will work with a small team to design and implement algorithms and infrastructure for modeling physical phenomena that play a crucial role in the fabrication of cutting-edge semiconductor components.
This is a perfect role for candidates who want to work with a team on state-of-the-art challenges in 3D modeling and simulation. This is a hands-on software engineering position requiring proficiency in C++, expertise in implementing FEM and other types of physical modeling. Your work will have a direct impact on how our partners and customers design and validate the highly complex 3D structures for today’s semiconductor devices.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Responsibilities
We are searching for a talented software engineer with a strong background in 3D modeling and simulation to join our development team. Our voxel-based 3D modeling engine simulates the fabrication of complex nanoscale semiconductor devices. As a key member of our modeling team, you will design and implement algorithms for modeling and simulating the physical phenomena that play a crucial role in the fabrication of cutting-edge semiconductor components.
This is a perfect role for candidates who want to work on state-of-the-art challenges in 3D modeling and simulation. This is a hands-on software engineering position requiring proficiency in C++, expertise in numerical or particle-based methods, and physical modeling. Your work will have a direct impact on how our partners and customers design and validate the highly complex 3D structures for today’s semiconductor devices.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
At Coventor Inc. (a Lam Research company) we build innovative software products to solve semiconductor manufacturing challenges around the world. Great engineering is Coventor’s heart and soul. Our software is envisioned and created by world-class engineers in many disciplines: software engineering, numerical physics, statistics, electrical engineering, quality assurance and development operations. Since our inception as an MIT spin-off in Technology Square, we’ve built an experienced management team able to incite fast product evolution through agile process. At Coventor, you will have autonomy and responsibility to take initiative and turn your ideas into great products.
We are looking for an experienced Senior Web Developer to join our dynamic team developing a world class semiconductor software platform in the web. You will be embedded in a collaborative software development team that is following the Scrum agile development process. Through daily engagement with the other developers and the QA team, you will play a critical role in helping us deliver quality software focusing more on the backend side of the platform. Your title and salary will be commensurate with your education and experience.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
Lam Research is seeking a Senior Automation Engineer to participate in the development of laboratory control systems that support operations and internal business associates. The successful candidate must demonstrate high levels of motivation, individual responsibility, and accountability; able to perform the essential functions listed below. The ideal candidate will be familiar with the software development life cycle including (SLDC) the planning, design, development, deployment, and sustaining stages. They also require an in-depth knowledge of different programming languages, frameworks, and tools.
Software Developers will know how to write elegant code based on product specifications and requirements. They should be familiar with testing, debugging, and improving their code and the work of their team members to deliver products on timely, cost, and effective manner. The ability to learn new programming languages, collect feedback and improve existing software is a desirable quality in applicants. They also require a good understanding of algorithms, flow charts and mathematical concepts that form the basis of computer programming.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Java Developer to join our team developing Spring Boot APIs "big data" platform. As a Java Developer on our team you will analyze complex business requirements and problems and drive research to design quality technical solutions. You will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, implementing, maintaining, and supporting application software. You will be actively involved throughout the project lifecycle, often starting with rapid prototypes early in the design phase, but most of the time you will ultimately be writing clean, production-ready code. You will work with both front-end and back-end web developers to create functional clean data service layer.
Responsibilities
This job requires you to apply your depth of software knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the development lifecycle. Responsibilities include software design and development along with support and maintenance of Big Data Products.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Senior Angular Developer to join our team developing web-based applications to leverage "big data" platform. As a UI Developer on our team, you will analyze complex business requirements and problems and drive research to design quality technical solutions. You will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, implementing, maintaining, and supporting application software. You will be actively involved throughout the project lifecycle, often starting with rapid prototypes early in the design phase, but most of the time you will ultimately be writing clean, production-ready code, which will be integrated with the backend/APIs. You will work with both front-end and back-end web developers to build all client-side logic. You will also be bridging the gap between the visual elements and the server-side infrastructure, taking an active role on both sides, and defining how the application looks and functions.

Can travel within USA, Europe, and Asia (total is less than 10%) when the need arises.

Title: Enterprise Software Application Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
We are searching for a talented software engineer with a strong background in 3D modeling and simulation to join our development team. Our voxel-based 3D modeling engine simulates the fabrication of complex nanoscale semiconductor devices. As a key member of our modeling team, you will design and implement algorithms for modeling and simulating the physical phenomena that play a crucial role in the fabrication of cutting-edge semiconductor components.
This is a perfect role for candidates who want to work on state-of-the-art challenges in 3D modeling and simulation. This is a hands-on software engineering position requiring proficiency in C++, expertise in numerical or particle-based methods, and physical modeling. Your work will have a direct impact on how our partners and customers design and validate the highly complex 3D structures for today’s semiconductor devices.
Responsibilities • Design and implement algorithms for simulating physical phenomena in semiconductor fabrication • Implement advanced 3D modeling algorithms working on complex 3D voxel models • Optimize algorithms for speed and robustness, including profiling and parallel implementation • Collaborate with our applications team to understand and troubleshoot customer requests and problems • Create high-quality software including unit tests and documentation

Title: Technical Program Manager 4
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
As a Technical Program Manager, you will develop supplier technical operations and quality systems to support Lam’s Global Supply Chain organization to meet delivery and quality requirements. You will manage cross-functional teams through meetings and deliverables in order to bring transformational processes solutions. You will be expected to deliver business results through effective program/project planning, governance, cross-functional team management, change management, and communication.

Job Duties Include:
Plan project activities, assemble cross-functional teams and manage projects from initiation through implementation and acceptance. Take appropriate actions to measure progress and meet schedules. Manage and drive project teams to achieve program objectives.

Title: Technical Program Manager 4
Job_Description:
Be Part of a New Technology
Lam is developing a new dry resist technology that will help extend the resolution, productivity, and yield of EUV lithography. Lam’s dry resist solutions offer significant EUV sensitivity and resolution advantages, which in turn contributes to more economic costs for each EUV wafer pass.
Dry photoresist is a revolutionary technique using dry technologies instead of the existing wet spin coating and development. The key advantages are stability, photosensitivity, environmental footprint, and cost. This evolving technology has demonstrated best-in-class resist performance at leading edge design rules and opens the door to a new world of innovations in EUV lithography patterning.
This significant opportunity for Lam means that we need to hire the best and the brightest talent to take this innovation to the next level. We invite you to join us as we embark on this journey and set out to advance dry resist technology. Let’s continue to revolutionize technology, together.

Title: Technical Program Manager 4
Job_Description:
Job Summary
This is a high visibility position that will support quality stakeholders across the organization in upstream quality improvement initiatives. This position will focus on aligning stakeholders and standardizing business processes, while also holding the stakeholders accountable to their goals.
Core Responsibilities
Act as quality stakeholder advocate and subject matter expert for quality systems and business processes to inform change decisions and project prioritization.
Run quality leader forums by facilitating accountability and collaboration discussions.
Inventory and define relevant data points in the quality system, how they are used (process mapping), and identify the stakeholders who use them.
Maintain reports, manage dashboards, and provide suggestions for business process improvements based upon data collected.

Title: Technical Program Manager 4
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
We are looking for an experienced Technical Program Manager for Lam Deposition Operations to execute critical margin and profitability initiatives. You will lead cross-functional teams in a highly matrixed environment, manage programs, and be able to deliver results in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. This will be accomplished by having demonstrated program management experience and the ability to build strong cross-functional partnerships.

Title: HRIS Analyst 5
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
As a senior professional in the HRIS field, the HRIS Analyst uses HR functional and system knowledge in building solutions to meet business requirements and resolve critical HR system issues. The HRIS team is responsible for all global HR systems associated with the automation, collection, accessibility, and usage of employee information. Works with the SAP/SuccessFactors Cloud and other Cloud Solutions (such as WorkHuman, Glint, Ingentis etc.) to meet the requirements of Human Resource management and Lam business units. Works with Global Human Resources personnel and GIS Applications team to evaluate HRIS software needs and may design new or modify existing HR systems to meet changing demands. Serves as HR department liaison to GIS function and other BU’s across Lam that have dependencies on HR Data.
Other Job Responsibilities

Title: Process Engineer 3
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
Technical
Responsible for managing and executing defect review queue with SEM&EDX analysis using state of the art 300mm SEM review tool to provide differentiated process technology solutions for optimum yield, on wafer performance and productivity. Additional chemical analysis and analytical techniques such as XRD/XRR/XRF, FTIR and XPS and surface analysis AFM is also required.
Develop new applications on dark field defect inspection and SEM review platforms to provide technologist the most sensitive and differentiated solutions for optimum defect reduction in support of key product development and other business critical projects to help win customer’s tool selection. Proficiency in any off-line defect analysis software from commercially available vendors is also required.
Collaborate with process technologists to deliver high information content results in timely manner to enable them to succeed in key product development and other business critical projects. Collaborate with vendors to maximize tool availability and performance.

Title: Process Engineer 3
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
Exceptional people come together to work at Lam Research. As proven by continually pushing the envelope Every day we drive the precision and accuracy that enable our customers to create the world’s most incredible technology–working at scales 1,000 times smaller than a grain of sand.
Do you want to work with a collaborative, dedicated, diverse team and gain cutting-edge experience in one of the fastest evolving industries? If you are ready to innovate and lead our Virtual Process Software R&D team, come join our esteemed development team!
You will be part of an organization that is revolutionizing Lam technology platforms and delivering a technology landscape that is simplified, modern, flexible and will ultimately enable Lam on its journey to 2023 and beyond.

Title: IT Systems Support Engineer
Job_Description:
Velo3D is a metal 3D printing technology company. 3D printing—also known as additive manufacturing (AM)—has a unique ability to improve the way high-value metal parts are built. However, legacy metal AM has been greatly limited in its capabilities since its invention almost 30 years ago. This has prevented the technology from being used to create the most valuable and impactful parts, restricting its use to specific niches where the limitations were acceptable.
Velo3D has overcome these limitations so engineers can design and print the parts they want. The company’s solution unlocks a wide breadth of design freedom and enables customers in space exploration, aviation, power generation, energy, and semiconductor to innovate the future in their respective industries. Using Velo3D, these customers can now build mission-critical metal parts that were previously impossible to manufacture. The end-to-end solution includes the Flow™ print preparation software, the Sapphire® family of printers, and the Assure™ quality control system—all of which are powered by Velo3D’s Intelligent Fusion® manufacturing process. The company delivered its first Sapphire® system in 2018 and has been a strategic partner to innovators such as SpaceX, Honeywell, Honda, Chromalloy, and Lam Research. Velo3D has been named to Fast Company’s prestigious annual list of the World’s Most Innovative Companies for 2021. For more information, please visit velo3d.com, or follow the company on LinkedIn or Twitter.

Develop data science solutions by leveraging existing data science software stack and machine learning platform using Python.

Title: Director of Loan Operations
Job_Description:
Loan Operations Specialist
Classification: Non-Exempt
Department: Loan Operations
POSITION PURPOSE
Ensures accurate and timely operations of the Bank's loan process to include but not limited to; the production of loan documentation, accurate booking on FiServ Loan system, verification and audit of loan input, follow up on loan documentation files (credit/collateral), maintaining document tracking tickles, completing or reviewing daily reports and balancing, servicing of loan, performing loan research and problem resolution and processing loan payoffs. Performs data entry functions and maintains commercial and consumer loan files. Assembles and record keeps for participations loans purchased and sold. Monitors loans for consistency of work quality and compliance with state and federal laws, regulations and bank lending policies and procedures. Responsible for performing routine administrative, operational and service support tasks. Implements departmental policies and procedures and modifies as needed.

Official transcripts will be required if selected to fill the position. INCOMPLETE APPLICATIONS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED. Note: If you have not applied for a position before using NeoGov, you will need to create an account. Inquiries: Jenna Lam; 808-956-2880; systempo@hawaii.edu EEO/AA, Clery Act, ADA The University of Hawai'i is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Institution and is committed to a policy of nondiscrimination on the basis of race, sex, gender identity and expression, age, religion, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, disability, genetic information, marital status, breastfeeding, income assignment for child support, arrest and court record (except as permissible under State law), sexual orientation, domestic or sexual violence victim status, national guard absence, or status as a covered veteran. For more information or inquiries regarding these policies, please refer to the following link: http://www.hawaii.edu/offices/eeo/eeo-coordinators/. Employment is contingent on satisfying employment eligibility verification requirements of the Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986; reference checks of previous employers; and for certain positions, criminal history record checks. In accordance with the Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act, annual campus crime statistics for the University of Hawai'i may be viewed at: https://www.hawaii.edu/titleix/help/campus-security/, or a paper copy may be obtained upon request from the respective UH Campus Security or Administrative Services Office. In accordance with Article 10 of the unit 08 collective bargaining agreement, bargaining unit members receive priority consideration for APT job vacancies. As a result, external or non BU 08 applicants may not be considered for some APT vacancies. BU 08 members with re-employment rights or priority status are responsible for informing the hiring unit of their status. Accommodation Request: The University of Hawai'i complies with the provisions of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). Determination on requests for reasonable accommodation will be made on a case-by-case basis. Title: Big Data Software Engineer 4
Job_Description:
Responsibilities
This job requires you to apply your depth of software knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the development lifecycle. Responsibilities include software design and development along with support and maintenance of Big Data and Enterprise Analytic solutions.
Design, develop and maintain cloud-based data pipelines and infrastructure components
Write high-performance, reliable, and maintainable software in Java.
Work closely with product lead and technical lead to capture software requirements and scope.
Qualifications
8+ years of related experience with a Bachelor degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering; or 6+ years’ experience with a Master degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering; or 3+ years’ experience with a PhD in Computer Science.

Title: Data Scientist 3
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
We are looking for a data scientist to join our data science team to develop cutting-edge data science capabilities and solutions for semiconductor manufacturing process development. This candidate will contribute to both solution research and capability development. The main responsibilities include:
Working with application and process engineers to understand problems arising from process development and translate them into data science problems.
Research, develop, and adopt advanced analytical, statistical, and machine learning methodologies to solve industry problems.
Develop data science solutions by leveraging existing data science software stack and machine learning platform using Python.

Title: Quality Performance Data Analytics Analyst
Job_Description:
Job Responsibilities
Lam Research is looking for a Performance Data & Analytics Analyst in Lam’s Global Quality organization. This is individual will partner with Quality Performance Data & Analytics Manager, Global Quality peers and leaders across the company to identify through the use a common data to effectively prioritize and resolve the largest quality issues in the company impacting our customers and limiting our ability to meet both short and term business objectives. This role will have a high-profile presence within the organization and will be able to contribute and make a difference in the quality performance and culture through knowledge, leadership and influence within the company and ultimately delivering required improve to our valued customers and internal functions.
Essential functions/duties:
Improve quality performance consistently from awareness, prioritization and action through the availability of common data.
